Detailed Description

This class handles creatures that are flinching after getting hit.

To know what direction to flinch in, they need to have the object that was touched. Additionally the calling object should have the fields flinchFrames and mercyInvincibilityFrames. Possible transitions: Finish flinch -> FallingState
